channel.title: Comments on: Dash Cover, Nardi Classic Steering Wheel, and D-Max Floor Mats

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2016/09/dash-cover-nardi-classic-steering-wheel-dmax-floor-mats/#comment-414632">Uncle Phil</a>.
Yeah it's pretty cool, there are a few US companies that make covers like this one including DashTopper and CoverKing. The Sedona Suede is nice.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Uncle Phil.

Yeah it’s pretty cool, there are a few US companies that make covers like this one including DashTopper and CoverKing. The Sedona Suede is nice.

item.title: By: Uncle Phil
item.dc:creator: Uncle Phil
item.description: Dash cover looks great. Thought it was Supermade at first, but it looks much better in quality (plus it's LHD).
item.content:encoded: Dash cover looks great. Thought it was Supermade at first, but it looks much better in quality (plus it’s LHD).
